roleset.name: causing death

example.name: arg0
example.text: Had two maternal uncles who were diagnosed with colon cancer in the 50 's and two maternal aunts who were diagnosed with cancers -LRB- one aunt had uterine , breast , and colon cancer diagnosed in 50 's , and another aunt had an aggressive malignancy which-1 *-1 was fatal within a month of diagnosis -RRB- .
